attributes.action: Petition: Allow students to be given a Maths Formula Sheet for Maths GCSE 2017
attributes.additional_details: it is very stressful for all students and could majorly affect results giving students lower grades to what to they could achieve with a formula sheet. Students of 2017 should be treated fairly to past students by being given this sheet. Maths is 1 of the 2 most important subjects needed for employment, but with the lack of requirements needed and the added stress to achieve our grades, many people who are capable of getting their pass could be destroyed due to their memory.
attributes.background: For the Maths GCSE 2017, students are expected to learn the Maths formulas off by heart. Considering we are also expected to memories many other topics on top of this,...
